query: WITH entities AS (SELECT collateralization_ratio, id FROM core_pending_credit_facilities WHERE COALESCE(customer_id = $1, $1 IS NULL) AND COALESCE(collateralization_state = $2, $2 IS NULL) AND (COALESCE((collateralization_ratio, id) < ($5, $4), $4 IS NULL)) ORDER BY collateralization_ratio DESC, id DESC LIMIT $3) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $6 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_pending_credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.collateralization_ratio desc, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
